long_description: One pack does it all-the 25-liter Burton Day Hiker snowboard pack is ideal for a quick snowboarding adventure, hiking or hauling books around campus. Ergonomic shoulder harness, back panel and hipbelt boost comfort. Spacious main compartment swallows up extra clothes, snacks, the ten essentials or school books and gear. Padded laptop sleeve fits up to 15 in. laptop. Three-strap vertical system carries your snowboard or skateboard on the front of the pack. Hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately); internal shovel pocket; fleece-lined goggles pocket.
short_description: One pack does it all-the 25-liter Burton Day Hiker snowboard pack is ideal for a quick snowboarding adventure, hiking or hauling books around campus.
